TunableEnum.description: Tags that represent the different types of objects that are used to run exams.

Tunable.name: PREVIOUS_SICKNESSES_TO_TRACK
Tunable.description: Number of previous sicknesses to track. Can use this to help promote variation of sicknesses a Sim receives over time.

TunableTuple.name: SICKNESS_CHANCE
TunableTuple.description: Chance of any given Sim to become sick. Chance is out of 100. When the sum of the base value and values from passed tests are greater than 100, the Sim is guaranteed to become sick during a sickness distribution pass. When 0 or below, the Sim will not get sick.

Tunable.name: base_value
Tunable.description: The basic value to return if no modifiers are applied.

TunableList.name: modifiers
TunableList.description: A list of modifiers to add to Base Value.

Tunable.name: modifier
Tunable.description: The value to apply add to Base Value if the associated tests pass. Can be negative

Tunable.name: multiply_by_count
Tunable.description: If enabled, will multiply the final test result in tests by the numeric result of the test if the tests pass. This only applies for tests that return a count. If you aren't sure if your test returns a count, ask your GPE and they can tell you. Note: This only works on the last test in the test list. If you aren't sure if your tuning is correct, please try it out in game to verify that it behaves correctly.

TdescFragTag.name: tests
TdescFragTag.description: A series of tests that must pass in order for the modifier to be applied.

TdescFragTag.name: SICKNESS_TESTS
TdescFragTag.description: Test sets determining whether or not a given Sim may become sick at all. These tests run before we attempt to roll on whether or not the Sim can avoid becoming sick. (ORs of ANDs)

TunableTuple.name: SICKNESS_TIME_OF_DAY
TunableTuple.description: Hour of day in which sicknesses will be distributed to Sims.
